name: Experiment 382: Week 8
description:
This is our final for Team Studio I. I am very proud of my team, Andrew and Braden worked very hard on achieving this. Andrew was the MVP as the Main Programmer, while Braden was the one who had the original concept of the game, and was our creative. This was a very long eight weeks, you can see what we had at week four. In four weeks we were able to add two more levels, sound, credits, and animation- as well as new mechanics, and background assets.   Please play the downloadable version, released by Andrew. It's also the intended version too, but we wanted to provide a WebGL version for those who cannot download it.

Please enjoy Experiment 382!
